attributes.action: Pay only Minimum Wages and No expenses to MP's
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The MP's are Public Servants and not owners of the Punlic purse. Thus they should only be paid Minimum Wages and not huge salaries of 000's of Pounds. Also, the per day allowance needs to be made to just £5 per day as per what most people in the Public Sector get. Why are the MP's and if anything is given extra it has to be taxed as income

rejection.details: MPs' expenses are a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
